title: Noel Gallagher puts Liam feud to back of his mind on date night with wife Sara
text:
Noel Gallagher puts Liam feud to back of his mind on date with wife Sara (Picture: Getty/BACKGRID)

Noel Gallagher has put the feud with his brother Liam to the back of his mind in order to enjoy quality time with his wife Sarah MacDonald.

The duo were pictured looking all loved up in London together as they made their way to their ride home.

And while ducking out of the rain, they appeared to be in high spirits as they laughed away before disappearing into the night.

The infamous guitarist, 52, was dressed head-to-toe in black and had broken up his outfit with a silver chain.

While his other half looked glamorous in a brown velvet jacket that she’d matched with a pair of black trousers.

They looked all loved up (Picture: Backgrid)

The former Oasis star has made headlines recently amid his public squabble with Liam.

When appearing on The Jonathan Ross Show, his little bro hit out at the musician, where he said he was having a ‘wobble’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Talking about his solo career, Liam told the host: ‘I’ve had a wobble but now I’m doing alright again. I think he’s [Noel] having a wobble now.’

He then went onto discuss his Madchester band and tried to come up with a reason the split – but failed miserably.

The boys have an ongoing public spat (Picture: Rex)

Liam said Noel’s solo career is taking a ‘wobble’ (Picture: Rex)

The 47-year-old explained: ‘I don’t know why we split up, I’d like to know. Maybe I might have been a bit too rock ‘n’ roll for him.

‘I might have cancelled a few gigs, I’ve might have stayed up later than I should have some nights. We’re not S f***ing Club 7.

‘Maybe he wanted to go solo and do his thing and be on his own and take all the fun out…

‘I don’t know what I’ve done really to be fair. We’ll get to the bottom of it one day.’

Pushed on the hidden meaning behind the lyrics of his solo songs, the Don’t Look Back In Anger hitmaker has made it clear he would be keen to get the band back together.

He continued: ‘I don’t think we should have split up. We’ve had worse arguments about lesser things. I think we need a good band like that, we did exactly what it said on the tin.’

description: Noel Gallagher puts Liam feud to back of his mind on date night with wife Sara.
